name: Santa Present Drop - Endless Side Scroller
name_original: Santa Present Drop - Endless Side Scroller
description:
Get ready for some high flying action! Santa Present Drop is an amazingly fun scrolling game where you are Santa!

Each level takes you through different villages that need their presents delivered. Fly around and drop the presents in their chimneys. Hit all the houses, and move on to the next village. Every time you complete one village, you fly faster, and faster.

Eat some cookies along your way to get more time, and pickup extra presents if you need them. But be careful, Santa's flying sleigh and on-coming birds don't mix.

There are unlimited levels to travel through, challenge your friends and family around the Christmas tree to see who can get the furthest.

Stay tuned for updates that will make this game even more fun!
